Text:
Video is a little pixellated. The movie was originally shot on low resolution film and there's a shitload of film grain on the original retail DVD. If you're looking for a better picture quality version, this is not it. This doesn't really look any better than the 700 MB avi versions.

Anyways,  I uploaded this for the people who want the commentary track in Swedish or a DVD version subtitled in English.
Are the subtitles on the film or are they separate?
You probably know this by now already, but anyways... the subtitles are normal DVD subtitles, i.e. they can be turned on/off.
